blog.name: xomarvelxo
blog.title: xoMarvelxo
blog.description:
I love Marvel and I'm open to requests/suggestions!
Masterlist

title: Tony Stark Drabble
body:
Request - Can I please request a Tony x reader and the reader is all shy and calm compared to Tony and he teases her about it because he loves when she’s little pouty baby (bonus points if the reader calls Tony daddy (also, it doesn’t have to be a smut))

“Hey, Tony.” She pushed open the door to the lab to find Tony sitting in front of a desk, hunched over. His hair was a little mussed like his fingers had run through it more than once. She didn’t fail to notice that he had stripped down to a white vest either. One that showed off his arms.

“What do you want me for?”

He leapt up, excitable for some reason. She really didn’t want to know the details.

“You’re here. Great! Come over here for me.”

He caught her by the arms, guiding her over to a machine by his desk. He put her in position in the centre of a glass cylinder. She looked up, confused, suspecting it was some kind of scanner. Then again she didn’t pretend to understand half of his inventions.

“Tony…”

“Just stand there,” he ordered and she immediately froze. “Don’t move.”

He darted back to the desk, tapped at some buttons and the scanner moved smoothly down, a light gliding over her body and then back up.

“Umm, Tony?” She wasn’t sure what had just happened.

He turned to her, eyes shining and a grin on his face. The kind she found irresistibly charming even though she knew she should know better. Had already made that mistake more than once.

“Don’t worry.” He held out a hand for her, helping her out of the scanner even though it really required no help. He didn’t let go even when she was out. “I just needed a female body.”

“Oh.” She couldn’t think of anything else to say. She never could when he spoke to her. It was baffling how they had ever even gotten this far. Probably because working in Stark Tower for the Avengers forced her to be around him and for whatever reason he seemed to find her awkwardness cute. At least, he seemed to enjoy making her feel as awkward as possible so he could tease her about it.

His eyes turned downward, taking a long, indulgent look over her body. His hands fell to her hips, barely gripping with his fingertips and yet still making her stomach flip.

“And you do have a very nice body.”

“Tony,” she reprimanded without much feeling. Her cheeks flushed pink.

He stepped right up close to her, his voice rough like fingers trailing down her back and making her shiver. “Although you look even better when I can see everything.”

Something about how he dragged out that last word sent a shot of pleasure straight to her centre. Flustered, she raised her hands impulsively to touch his chest, arms, who knew. Somehow controlling herself she put her hands lightly against his chest, fingers curled.

He pulled her somehow closer, bodies flush, his forehead almost resting against hers as she refused to look at him. “How about you be a nice girl and let me see again?”

She faintly tried to pull away even knowing he wasn’t going to let her go. They had been through this before and she always gave in though it never went any further after. She wasn’t sure she wanted it to. Maybe because the nights they spent together were so amazing. They were literally the best sex she had ever had but after she always made sure to disappear. And Tony never made a fuss over it.

Maybe because he knew he could always get her back. It was like he knew she opened up and did things with him she had never done before.

“T-Tony, I can’t.”

“Can’t?” he teased, nuzzling against her neck and making her breath hitch. His lips glided across her skin, barely touching. “Oh, I think you can.”

She licked her lips, breathless already. Her eyes went to the window. Anyone walking past would see them. She couldn't… didn’t know how to explain this if they were caught. God it was hard to breathe.

“Do you want me to take you right here?”

“Tony,” she squeaked, making him laugh just a little. He pulled back to look at her, cupping her face with one hand. It was embarrassing how easily it made her soft and pliant.

“What’s wrong?” he teased. “You don’t want me to ravish you right here on my desk?”

Her eyes darted to the door again. “Tony,” she whined. “Stop it.”

Fingers clutching in his shirt she tried to steady herself as he watched her, eyes eating up every little detail. She felt like she was under a microscope when his full attention was on her and it was overwhelming.

“FRIDAY,” he said without looking away, “lock the door and shut the blinds.”

She knew there was no resisting it then and as the blinds slid down, hiding them from view, he turned to press her up against the desk. “You’re so mean,” she pouted.

Another throaty chuckle. “How am I mean, little one?”

“You’re always teasing me.”

“But you’re so cute when you’re shy.”

He leant in before she could give any more weak complaints, kissing her pouting lips. She didn’t even try to resist. There was really no need for all his teasing and flirting. All he had to do was kiss her and she would have given in without thinking.

As his tongue swiped over her bottom lip, teasing his way inside, she felt all resolve abandon her. God did she want him to take her on that desk. It was like he knew she had been fantasising about it since the very first time he had given her his full attention.

He broke away, dark gaze scanning her face silently for permission. Her own eyes were half lidded, her gaze soft and dreamy from his kisses. A slow smile spread over her face as she wound her arms around his neck.

“Daddy,” she whispered.

Biting his lip, Tony groaned as he pulled her close against him and kissed her hungrily.


Sorry it took a while but I haven’t been very well. If you liked it please like and check out the rest of my blog x

Thank you for the request. I’ve never written Tony before. Was it ok?

Kaya x

He leapt up, excitable for some reason. She really didn’t want to know the details.

“You’re here. Great! Come over here for me.”

He caught her by the arms, guiding her over to a machine by his desk. He put her in position in the centre of a glass cylinder. She looked up, confused, suspecting it was some kind of scanner. Then again she didn’t pretend to understand half of his inventions.

“Tony…”

“Just stand there,” he ordered and she immediately froze. “Don’t move.”

He darted back to the desk, tapped at some buttons and the scanner moved smoothly down, a light gliding over her body and then back up.

“Umm, Tony?” She wasn’t sure what had just happened.

He turned to her, eyes shining and a grin on his face. The kind she found irresistibly charming even though she knew she should know better. Had already made that mistake more than once.

“Don’t worry.” He held out a hand for her, helping her out of the scanner even though it really required no help. He didn’t let go even when she was out. “I just needed a female body.”

“Oh.” She couldn’t think of anything else to say. She never could when he spoke to her. It was baffling how they had ever even gotten this far. Probably because working in Stark Tower for the Avengers forced her to be around him and for whatever reason he seemed to find her awkwardness cute. At least, he seemed to enjoy making her feel as awkward as possible so he could tease her about it.

His eyes turned downward, taking a long, indulgent look over her body. His hands fell to her hips, barely gripping with his fingertips and yet still making her stomach flip.

“And you do have a very nice body.”

“Tony,” she reprimanded without much feeling. Her cheeks flushed pink.

He stepped right up close to her, his voice rough like fingers trailing down her back and making her shiver. “Although you look even better when I can see everything.”

Something about how he dragged out that last word sent a shot of pleasure straight to her centre. Flustered, she raised her hands impulsively to touch his chest, arms, who knew. Somehow controlling herself she put her hands lightly against his chest, fingers curled.

He pulled her somehow closer, bodies flush, his forehead almost resting against hers as she refused to look at him. “How about you be a nice girl and let me see again?”

She faintly tried to pull away even knowing he wasn’t going to let her go. They had been through this before and she always gave in though it never went any further after. She wasn’t sure she wanted it to. Maybe because the nights they spent together were so amazing. They were literally the best sex she had ever had but after she always made sure to disappear. And Tony never made a fuss over it.

Maybe because he knew he could always get her back. It was like he knew she opened up and did things with him she had never done before.

“T-Tony, I can’t.”

“Can’t?” he teased, nuzzling against her neck and making her breath hitch. His lips glided across her skin, barely touching. “Oh, I think you can.”

She licked her lips, breathless already. Her eyes went to the window. Anyone walking past would see them. She couldn't… didn’t know how to explain this if they were caught. God it was hard to breathe.

“Do you want me to take you right here?”

“Tony,” she squeaked, making him laugh just a little. He pulled back to look at her, cupping her face with one hand. It was embarrassing how easily it made her soft and pliant.

“What’s wrong?” he teased. “You don’t want me to ravish you right here on my desk?”

Her eyes darted to the door again. “Tony,” she whined. “Stop it.”

Fingers clutching in his shirt she tried to steady herself as he watched her, eyes eating up every little detail. She felt like she was under a microscope when his full attention was on her and it was overwhelming.

“FRIDAY,” he said without looking away, “lock the door and shut the blinds.”

She knew there was no resisting it then and as the blinds slid down, hiding them from view, he turned to press her up against the desk. “You’re so mean,” she pouted.

Another throaty chuckle. “How am I mean, little one?”

“You’re always teasing me.”

“But you’re so cute when you’re shy.”

He leant in before she could give any more weak complaints, kissing her pouting lips. She didn’t even try to resist. There was really no need for all his teasing and flirting. All he had to do was kiss her and she would have given in without thinking.

As his tongue swiped over her bottom lip, teasing his way inside, she felt all resolve abandon her. God did she want him to take her on that desk. It was like he knew she had been fantasising about it since the very first time he had given her his full attention.

He broke away, dark gaze scanning her face silently for permission. Her own eyes were half lidded, her gaze soft and dreamy from his kisses. A slow smile spread over her face as she wound her arms around his neck.

“Daddy,” she whispered.

Biting his lip, Tony groaned as he pulled her close against him and kissed her hungrily.


Sorry it took a while but I haven’t been very well. If you liked it please like and check out the rest of my blog x

Thank you for the request. I’ve never written Tony before. Was it ok?

Kaya x

blog.name: cyberdelph
blog.title: Delph's World
blog.description:
I love reading...I like quotes and girly stuff...

Fan of the Cut & Run Serie & MM romance. 

Also a Black Dagger Brotherhood addict and a THIRDs nerds.

My favorite TV shows are : The Vampire Diaries, Teen Wolf, Buffy the vampire Slayer, Beauty & the Beast, Nikita, Bitten, Sherlock, Almost Human,Veronica Mars, The Following, Flash,iZombie,Supernatural, Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D, MCU...

Sometimes NSFW, so be warned...

Multifandom blog - Hate free blog. 
Multi shipper - Ship all the ships...No drama zone.

blog.name: skeletonsonline
blog.title: SKELETONS ONLINE
blog.description: Skeletons dressed up as Humans dressed up as Skeletons

summary:
Winter Solider kills some parents
♋ Black Panther - while my rage knows no limit, I've learned that hate will only breed more...
body:
Winter Solider kills some parents

♋ Black Panther - while my rage knows no limit, I’ve learned that hate will only breed more hate. I must reflect on my past in order to properly lead my people. There are more important matters to take care of so i must learn forgiveness to move on.

♌ Iron Man - how many movies do you think I can stretch this grudge out??

blog.name: ask--frostiron
blog.title: FROSTIRON
blog.description:
Ask Loki and Tony about anything!

This was mostly Tony’s idea!

We really like interacting,

Loki more begrudgingly

EST: Jan. 4, 2019 by two admins

summary: Quick note: This challenge is extremely dangerous, you may die. Anyway, the first test, beginning on exactly 1/12/19 at three...
question: Quick note: This challenge is extremely dangerous, you may die. Anyway, the first test, beginning on exactly 1/12/19 at three PM, challenges your knowledge of each other, King Tony and King Steve shall be stuck to separate walls while King Loki and King Thor are on the other side of the rooms, you must answer various questions about them, if you get one wrong I throw a knife. Good luck. (ooc:is there any way we could actually do this contest?)
answer:
Ooo, I like that it involves knives.

(Idk, have you been in contact with a Thor and Steve? Also Admin Tony works the 12th from 2:30-11)

tags: this was my own idea i thought of
body:
A Normal Day With Stark

*Stark in his lab working on his iron man suit, trying to fix whatever Peter did to it.*

Stark: That kid will be the death of me..*He sighs and finally finds what is wrong with the suit. Peter left a note in a very inconvenient place for him.*

-The note said-

“Dear Mr.Stark

I just had to say I had so much fun today learning about your suit and mine. I can’t wait till we get to do it again. Thank you so much for taking me under your wing.

I Love you dad”

*He smiled at the note. He went to his corkboard and pinned it up with the other notes from Peter. All of them from their previous lessons. Every one about how much he had enjoyed it and every time his train of thought was interrupted by-*

Peter: *He bursts through the door without knocking* Mister Stark you won’t believe what I just saw!

*He smiled at this everyday when Peter did it. He loved being Peter’s mentor. He never wanted it to end…*

*He smiled at the note. He went to his corkboard and pinned it up with the other notes from Peter. All of them from their previous lessons. Every one about how much he had enjoyed it and every time his train of thought was interrupted by-*

Peter: *He bursts through the door without knocking* Mister Stark you won’t believe what I just saw!

*He smiled at this everyday when Peter did it. He loved being Peter’s mentor. He never wanted it to end…*
trail.content:
A Normal Day With Stark

*Stark in his lab working on his iron man suit, trying to fix whatever Peter did to it.*

Stark: That kid will be the death of me..*He sighs and finally finds what is wrong with the suit. Peter left a note in a very inconvenient place for him.*

-The note said-

“Dear Mr.Stark

I just had to say I had so much fun today learning about your suit and mine. I can’t wait till we get to do it again. Thank you so much for taking me under your wing.

I Love you dad”

*He smiled at the note. He went to his corkboard and pinned it up with the other notes from Peter. All of them from their previous lessons. Every one about how much he had enjoyed it and every time his train of thought was interrupted by-*

Peter: *He bursts through the door without knocking* Mister Stark you won’t believe what I just saw!

*He smiled at this everyday when Peter did it. He loved being Peter’s mentor. He never wanted it to end…*

title: Captain Popstar
body:
The other day @destiel-is-classic and I were discussing head cannons when she threw out one about Steve unapologetically loving pop music.
We bounced it around for awhile and I think?? I’ve fallen in love?? with this head cannon?? 
Anyway…
I wrote a little thing on it. 

Tony falls asleep on a Saturday to the comforting weight of Steve in bed next to him. The feeling of his boyfriend’s arms wrapped around him and his calm breathing are the perfect combination to sooth Tony into a restful sleep.

Tony wakes too early on a Sunday morning. Somebody in his apartment is singing… not badly? He notices that Steve is missing from their bed, but it’s almost 9, it’s likely he’s already gone on his run and is on the communal floor with the others.

But that begs the question of who is singing? And why are they singing The Pussycat Dolls on a Sunday morning?

Tony wishes for a moment he hadn’t taken Peppers advice and did keep a suit in his room because really, he could use one right now.

Instead he grabs his phone and the prototype for a gauntlet he had been tinkering with a few nights ago. It’s a little glitchy, but some criminal wouldn’t know that. Tony wields his weapons and slowly leaves his room. He rounds the corner into the kitchen to see…

Steve, clad in only the blue Henley he had worn for dinner the night before and a pair of boxers that remind Tony god is real. The blonde is dancing barefoot around the kitchen, cooking.

Tony watches for a moment, committing everything about the moment to memory as Steve sings the next verse.

“I know she loves you,” Steve sings into the spatula he’s holding. Comically he embellishes the little things, squeezing his eyes shut as he brings the hand not clutching the spatula above his head. “I understand. I’d probably be just as crazy about you, if you were my own man.”

Cap does a little shuffle; the move reminds Tony of Elvis for a reason he can’t explain. He abandons the gauntlet prototype, opening the camera on his phone to take a video.

“Until then, old friend, your secret is safe with me,” Steve finishes the verse dramatically, throwing his head back and belting into the spatula.

That moment is when Tony loses his, he almost doubles over laughing. The sound of Tony’s laughter catches his boyfriend attention and soon Steve abandons the spatula and fake audience. He’s singing for Tony now. Looking directly at the brown-haired, brown-eyed man as he leads forward and shimmies his shoulders.

“Don’tcha wish your boyfriend was hot like me?” Steve sings, voice beautiful and eyes full of laughter. “Don’tcha wish your boyfriend was a freak like me?”

Tony nods, expression sage and voice schooled into the faux serious tone he uses with the press.

“Yes, yes I do,” Tony deadpans. Watching as this time Steve dissolves into giggles before sweeping his boyfriend into a hug and kissing him.

One kiss turns to two, two kisses turn to four. The breakfast Steve is cooking is soon forgotten.

They have to clean burned food and choose to order in for breakfast.

Two days later Tony sends the video to Bucky, the text just reads.

you never told me Steve could sing.

Bucky replies two minutes later, a video of his own attached.

I thought you knew?

The video Bucky attaches is short, but Tony loves all 15 seconds of it. 15 seconds of Steve in the Tower gym. He’s wearing gray joggers and a shirt that should be illegal. Steve is running treadmill, well– dancing with his earbuds in. Normal people would be too short on breath to even talk, Steve is singing. The chorus of Beyonce’s hit Single Ladies fills Tony’s ears as it leaves the speakers on his phone. The recording lasts long enough for Tony to see Steve sing and dance an entire chorus before cutting off.

He saves it.
body_abstract:
The other day @destiel-is-classic and I were discussing head cannons when she threw out one about Steve unapologetically loving pop music.
We bounced it around for awhile and I think?? I’ve fallen in love?? with this head cannon??

summary: Pepper is his current alpha, but Tony is attracted to Strange while being grateful to Pepper. He likes it, but it's not the same...
caption: Pepper is his current alpha, but Tony is attracted to Strange while being grateful to Pepper. He likes it, but it’s not the same love, strong between Alpha and Omega. So he lets Pepper make sure he does not suffer if he has to change Alpha. Because she knows that Strange is better at managing and understanding Tony than she is. Especially with Iron Man. Pepper was like a protective mom with her puppies, she cared for Tony, brought him comfort and everything he needed. But now, Stephen is here to take over and make puppies for Tony. ~

summary: You can choose your own wake phrase so no one sets off everyone’s phones. We tried to encourage people to customize it through...
body: You can choose your own wake phrase so no one sets off everyone’s phones. We tried to encourage people to customize it through all sorts of options like voice type and humor, actually found phones were less accident prone when people felt their machine had a unique personality.

summary:
Peter: Hey Mr. Stark! How’s the auto biography going?
Tony: It’s basically ready to be published. 
Peter: Oh cool, can I...
body:
Peter: Hey Mr. Stark! How’s the auto biography going?
Tony: It’s basically ready to be published. 
Peter: Oh cool, can I see?
Tony: You know what, that’s not a good-
Peter: *peeking over* Is this just a list of title ideas?
Tony:...yes?
